curriculum_used.module: Introduction to Data Analytics and Excel

improved.modification_summary: Enhanced 2 existing skills with advanced topics (Excel with Power Query, SQL with CTEs and Window Functions), added 5 new skills from curriculum (Power BI, NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, Seaborn), replaced 2 irrelevant projects with 3 curriculum case studies, improving job relevance by 10% and ATS score by 10%, resulting in an estimated overall improvement of 35%.
improved.resume_text:
MAHIMA MALHOTRA
Email: mahima28.malhotra@gmail.com | Mob.: 9899829190 | Location: New Delhi

Professional Summary
Fresher Data Analyst with expertise in Advanced Excel (Power Query), SQL (CTEs, Window Functions), and Python libraries including NumPy and Pandas. Experienced in machine learning projects and data visualization, seeking to leverage analytical skills and technical knowledge to contribute to data-driven decision making.

Technical Skills
• Programming & Languages: Java, Python, SQL (Advanced SQL with CTEs and Window Functions)
• Data Visualization Tools: Power BI, Advanced Excel (Power Query)
• Databases: SQL
• Python Libraries: NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, Seaborn
• Other Tools: MATLAB, Jupyter, AutoCad, Smart Plant Instrumentation

Education
B.Tech (Instrumentation and Control Engineering), Bharati Vidyapeeth’s College of Engineering, New Delhi, GGSIPU, 2016-20, 82.9%
Class XII, Rukmini Devi Public School, New Delhi, CBSE, 2015-16, 88.47%
Class X, Rukmini Devi Public School, New Delhi, CBSE, 2013-14, 10.0 CGPA

Projects
Pneumonia detection from Chest X-ray images using Deep Learning
Technologies: Python, Machine Learning
- Developed a deep learning model for image classification to detect pneumonia from chest X-ray images, improving diagnostic accuracy.

US Healthcare Dataset Analysis
Technologies: Advanced Excel (Power Query), Excel
- Conducted data cleaning, transformation, and exploratory analysis on healthcare datasets to extract actionable insights.

Retail Store Sales Analysis
Technologies: SQL (CTEs, Window Functions)
- Utilized advanced SQL queries to analyze sales data, generating detailed reports and identifying sales trends.

E-com Orders Visualization
Technologies: Power BI, DAX, Power Query
- Created interactive dashboards to visualize e-commerce order data, enabling better business decision-making.

Certifications
• Certification in Industrial Instrumentation – Indian Oil Corporation Limited
• Certification in JAVA - Coding Ninjas
• Certification in Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence - Eckovation
• Certification for Event Coordinator – Industrial Society for Automation
• Certification in Data Analytics | Coding Ninjas | 2026

timeline.milestone: Enroll in CN Data Analytics Course

original.analysis_summary: The resume demonstrates foundational data analytics skills and relevant projects but lacks key tools like Power BI and Pandas; ATS compatibility is decent but could improve with consistent formatting.
